original_text:
Chilli Master
La cucina messicana è di sicuro ricca di sapori e a ricordarcelo ci pensa Chilli Master, la slot Realistic che ha nel peperoncino rosso il suo portafortuna!
Un esplosione di gusto
Di sicuro non sarà tra le più rinomate, ma di sicuro la cucina messicana è una delle più gustose e per questo è apprezzata in ogni angolo del globo. Ingrediente tipico è il chilli, il peperoncino piccante tanto amato anche dai provider che spesso creano slot a tema. In Chilli Master però non è solo il peperoncino ad essere protagonista, ma in generale tutte le portate tipiche che si possono assaporare in un buon ristorante messicano. Si va dai burritos ai tacos, passando per l’avocado e i fagioli piccanti.
Il gioco è ambientato in quella che sembra essere una qualche festa, vista la presenza di bandierina e colori sgargianti.
Con una grafica ben fatta, dove i simboli sono disegnati così bene che basta guardarli per sentire l’acquolina in bocca, siamo sicuri che Chilli Master saprà tenervi compagnia per parecchie ore.
Caratteristiche di Chilli Master
La Realistic ha optato per la tradizione, scegliendo una griglia di gioco semplice con 5 rulli e 3 righe. È qui che sono sistemate le nostre 20 linee di pagamento fisse, con una vincita massima pari a 6.500 volte il valore della puntata.
La giocata minima è di 0,20 €, la massima 20 €.
Vengono considerate combo vincenti quelle che interessano simboli identici su rulli adiacenti, da sinistra verso destra, a partire dal primo rullo.
I giri automatici ci permettono di impostare un numero di giri senza bisogno di cliccare ogni volta sul tasto Play.
La volatilità è alta, il ritorno teorico al giocatore è piuttosto basso, essendo pari al 94,5%. Ricordiamo però che questo è un dato del tutto teorico, testato solo sui grandi numeri e che influenza in minima parte l’andamento delle vincite.
Simboli e funzionalità di Chilli Master
Come nella stragrande maggioranze delle slot, anche in questa troviamo simboli non tematici, le carte da gioco, che assegnano vincite relativamente basse. Molto più remunerativi sono i simboli che prendono spunto dalla cucina messicana: avocado, burritos, tacos, lo chef e i fagioli piccanti ci ricompensano con cifre ben al di sopra della media.
Passiamo ora ai simboli speciali: il peperoncino è il nostro Wild, può comparire su tutti i rulli tranne che sul primo e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter.
Inoltre, se una combo viene conclusa con un Wild, l’importo vinto verrà raddoppiato.
Lo chef è il nostro Scatter e può atterrare in ogni punto della griglia. Con 3, 4 o 5 di questi simboli, ci verranno assegnati dei giri gratis durante i quali partiremo con un moltiplicatore 2x. Ogni volta che atterra un Wild, il moltiplicatore aumenterà di un’unità.

Domande Frequenti 
A quanto ammonta la vincita massima?

In Chilli Master si può vincere al massimo 6.500 volte il valore della puntata.



Posso giocare a Chilli Master solo sul pc?

No, assolutamente, Chilli Master è un gioco che gira anche su dispositivi mobili come smartphone e tablet.



Quante sono le paylines di Chilli Master?

In questa slot abbiamo 20 linee di pagamento fisse, ciò vuol dire che il numero non può essere variato.

raw_translation.response:
Chilli Master
Mexican cuisine is certainly full of flavors, and Chilli Master reminds us of this with its realistic slot featuring the lucky red chili pepper!
An explosion of taste
Mexican cuisine may not be the most renowned, but it is certainly one of the tastiest and is appreciated in every corner of the globe. A typical ingredient is chili, the spicy pepper loved by providers who often create themed slots. In Chilli Master, however, it is not only the chili that is the protagonist, but all the typical dishes that you can savor in a good Mexican restaurant. From burritos to tacos, passing through avocado and spicy beans.
The game is set in what seems to be some kind of party, with the presence of flags and bright colors.
With a well-made graphics, where the symbols are so well drawn that just looking at them makes your mouth water, we are sure that Chilli Master will keep you company for several hours.
Features of Chilli Master
Realistic has opted for tradition, choosing a simple game grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. Here our 20 fixed paylines are arranged, with a maximum win of 6,500 times the value of the bet.
The minimum bet is €0.20, the maximum is €20.
Winning combos are considered those that involve identical symbols on adjacent reels, from left to right, starting from the first reel.
The autoplay feature allows us to set a number of spins without having to click the Play button every time.
The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to the player is rather low, being equal to 94.5%. However, we remind you that this is a purely theoretical figure, tested only on large numbers and that it has a minimal impact on the trend of winnings.
Symbols and functionality of Chilli Master
As in the vast majority of slots, we also find non-themed symbols, playing cards, which give relatively low wins. Much more lucrative are the symbols inspired by Mexican cuisine: avocado, burritos, tacos, the chef, and the spicy beans reward us with amounts well above average.
Now let's move on to the special symbols: the chili pepper is our Wild, it can appear on all reels except the first one and replaces all symbols except for the Scatter.
Furthermore, if a combo is completed with a Wild, the amount won will be doubled.
The chef is our Scatter and can land anywhere on the grid. With 3, 4, or 5 of these symbols, we will be awarded free spins during which we will start with a 2x multiplier. Every time a Wild lands, the multiplier will increase by one unit.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is the maximum win amount?
In Chilli Master, you can win up to 6,500 times the value of the bet.

Can I only play Chilli Master on PC?
No, absolutely not. Chilli Master is a game that also runs on mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

How many paylines does Chilli Master have?
In this slot, we have 20 fixed paylines, meaning that the number cannot be changed.

Review:
 
Game Design and Graphics

Chilli Master, the Realistic slot game, has a great design that brings to life the flavors of Mexican cuisine. The game is set in a festive atmosphere, with bright colors and flags that create an authentic Mexican ambiance. The graphics are well-designed, with symbols that are drawn so well that they make players feel like they are in front of a plate ready to enjoy a good Mexican meal.

Volatility and RTP

Chilli Master has a high volatility and a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 94.5%. However, it's important to remember that the RTP is a purely theoretical figure that only minimally affects the course of winnings, and is tested only on large numbers. The high volatility of the game means that players can potentially win large sums of money, but they'll have to be patient in waiting for a winning combination.

Paylines and Symbols

Chilli Master has 5 reels and 3 rows with 20 fixed paylines. Winning combinations are formed by identical symbols on adjacent reels, from left to right, starting from the first reel. The game has non-themed symbols, the playing cards, and themed symbols that are related to Mexican cuisine, including avocado, burritos, tacos, the chef and spicy beans. The maximum win amount is 6,500 times the value of the bet.

Wild and Scatter Symbols

The Chilli symbol is the Wild and can appear on all reels except the first. It replaces all symbols except the Scatter. If a combo is completed with a Wild, the amount won will be doubled. The Chef symbol is the Scatter and can appear anywhere on the reels. When three or more of these symbols land on the reels, players are awarded free spins during which they start with a 2x multiplier. If a Wild lands, the multiplier increases by one unit.

Free Spins and Multipliers

Chilli Master offers players the opportunity to win free spins and multipliers. When players land three or more Chef symbols, they are awarded with free spins. During these free spins, players start with a 2x multiplier, and every time a Wild lands on the reels, the multiplier increases by one unit. This gives players the potential to win larger sums of money and makes the game more exciting.

Review: Chilli Master

Mexican cuisine is certainly rich in flavors and Chilli Master, the Realistic slot game, reminds us of this, with its lucky red pepper!

An explosion of taste

While it may not be the most well-known, Mexican cuisine is certainly one of the most tasty, and so it is appreciated in every corner of the world. The typical ingredient is chilli, the spicy pepper beloved by providers who often create themed slots. In Chilli Master, however, it's not just the pepper that's the star, but generally all the typical dishes that can be savored in a good Mexican restaurant. From burritos to tacos, passing through avocado and spicy beans.

The game is set in what appears to be some kind of party, with flags and bright colors.

With well-designed graphics, where the symbols are drawn so well that just looking at them is enough to make your mouth water, we are confident that Chilli Master will keep you company for several hours.

Chilli Master Features

Realistic has opted for tradition, choosing a simple game grid with 5 reels and 3 rows. Here, our 20 fixed paylines are arranged, with a maximum win of 6,500 times the value of the bet.

The minimum bet is €0.20, while the maximum is €20.

Winning combinations are those that involve identical symbols on adjacent reels, from left to right, starting from the first reel.

Automatic spins allow us to set a number of spins without the need to click the Play button every time.

The volatility is high, and the theoretical return to player is quite low, at 94.5%. However, we remember that this is a purely theoretical figure, tested only on large numbers and that it only minimally affects the course of winnings.

Symbols and features of Chilli Master

As in the vast majority of slots, we also find non-themed symbols, the playing cards, which assign relatively low winnings. Much more rewarding are the symbols that take inspiration from Mexican cuisine: avocado, burritos, tacos, the chef and spicy beans reward us with amounts well above average.

Let's move on to the special symbols: the chilli is our Wild, and can appear on all reels except the first, replacing all symbols except the Scatter. Furthermore, if a combo is completed with a Wild, the amount won will be doubled.

The chef is our Scatter and can land anywhere on the grid. With 3, 4 or 5 of these symbols, we will be awarded free spins during which we will start with a 2x multiplier. Every time a Wild lands, the multiplier will increase by one unit.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the maximum win amount?

In Chilli Master, you can win up to 6,500 times the value of the bet.

Can I only play Chilli Master on PC?

No, absolutely not. Chilli Master is a game that also runs on mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

How many paylines does Chilli Master have?

In this slot, we have 20 fixed paylines, which means that the number cannot be varied.
